Training and Placement Office . The power house of UVCE where Students handle the companies with the help of Placement Officer Mrs.Triveni. Placement Office was started from the year 1987, from then on it acts a bridge between companies and students. The TPO has the record of successfully placing 90% of its students into Globally recognized companies with an attractive CTC. It's just because of this Placement Office we have our alumni in higher posts in MNCs. Batch of 2016 witnessed a record of 1000+ offers which stood 1st in the state in terms of job ratio to number of students.
